sen.j: 己爾乃神社（こじのじんじゃ）は滋賀県守山市に鎮座する神社である。
sen.e: Kojino-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine that exists in Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture.
Kojino-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: that existsをlocatedに変更しました。
sen.e: Kojino-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Moriyama City, Shiga Prefecture.
It is a shikinai-sha (shrine listed in Engishiki laws) ronja (shrines considered to be descendants of a shikinai-sha).
It is a Shikinaisha ronja (a Shinto shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines listed in Engishiki laws).
sen.cmt: 括弧の説明を1つにまとめました。
sen.e: It is a Shikinaisha ronja (a Shinto shrine considered to be a descendant of shrines listed in Engishiki laws).

sen.j: 大宝 (日本)3年に中臣為恵により創祀されたと伝わる。
sen.e: It has been said that the shrine was built by NAKATOMI no Tamee in 703.
sen.cmt: 「中臣為恵」の読みは推測です。
sen.e: It has been said that the shrine was built by NAKATOMI no 為恵 in 703.
sen.cmt: 「中臣為恵」の読み方不明です。
sen.e: It has been said that the shrine was built by NAKATOMI no 為恵 in 703.

sen.cmt: 前列の変更に合わせました。

sen.j: 永禄年間の兵乱により社殿等失われたが、寛政3年には旧に復した。
sen.e: The main building and other buildings of the shrine was destroyed by the battles during Eiroku ear, but in 1791 it was rebuilt.
The main building and others of the shrine were destroyed by the battles during the Eiroku era, but in 1791 it was rebuilt.
sen.cmt: スペルミス等修正しました。
sen.e: The main building and others of the shrine were destroyed by the battles during the Eiroku era, but in 1791 it was rebuilt.
It was a gosha (village shrine in the old classification of shrines).
It was a gosha (village shrine in the old classification of shrines).
It was a gosha (village shrine in the old classification of shrines).

tit.cmt: 大文字に変更しました。

sen.e: the cultural property designated by the city
A cultural property designated by the city
A cultural property designated by the city
